entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
